column4: when I typed in aplay -l ; I got two card 0 and one card 1 , which was soundblaster
I am reading over the tutorials and its not making any sense. I love linux, but I am very new. The tutorials are written for expert linux users.
please help with making my sound card (I dont know what kind of sound card I have, but it works with windows xp)
work
how do i find out what kind of sound card I have?
terminal, type "lspci"
done
should see it listed there
00:1f.5 Multimedia audio controller: Intel Corporation 82801DB/DBL/DBM (ICH4/ICH4-L/ICH4-M) AC'97 Audio Controller (rev 03)
now what should I do?
lets see if the modules are loaded
I do see snd_intel8x0
I do see snd_intel8x0
so you have sound ... open a terminal and look at the mixer settings .... alsamixer ... use arrow keys to change them and M for unmute/mute then esc ...
that is good
when I typed alsamixer I got weird graphs. what should I do now?
look for one with MM
I found three with MM "CD Contr" "Mic Boos" and "IEC958"
i should have asked... ubuntu, right?
yeah I use ubuntu
how do I save what I just did?
whats a mixer tool?
when I type in mixer_applet in the black box it says "command not found"
